resources.string: Oh No! Pooh rolled a 4 and it caused him to slip down 4 branches
Oh No! A sudden gust of wind blew Pooh sideways and stopped him from making progress
Oh No! Pooh ran into a swarm of Bees, Pooh loses his next turn as a result
Congratulations! Pooh was able to reach the top of the tree and gets to satiate his hunger with some honey!
